explains: v. 雕，刻；切下，割下；开创，赢得（carve out）；铺（路），修（路）；侵蚀，冲刷；减少，削减
wordGroup: carve out 创业；开拓；雕刻
carve up v. 瓜分；划分
carve out of 从……切出（引伸为修建）

sentences.en: They began to carve separate letters.
sentences.cn: 他们开始雕刻独立的字母。

sentences.en: Shopkeepers would carve into stone, clay, or wood symbols for the products they had for sale.
sentences.cn: 店主会在出售的商品上刻上石头、粘土或木头的符号。

sentences.en: Gillian had asked a local worker to carve the bowls from a piece of the trunk of the golden elm.
sentences.cn: 吉莉安让当地的一个工人用金榆树的树干来雕刻碗。
